Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: Newly-joined node to etcd/raft network should bootstrap with empty peer list
Issue.description: it should be doing this|https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/blob/cc8d446a6ec334d7a10a291279b77389b4f2faf7/contrib/raftexample/raft.go#L290-L292 Â in etcd raftexample, instead of this|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/d3e80320e5bd97bf7e1232f327be6377c66e3d5f/orderer/consensus/etcdraft/consenter.go#L120 in consenter.
